National Theatre Live - Frankenstein (Encore Screening)

ID may be required

Oscar winner Danny Boyle ('127 Hours' and 'Slumdog Millionaire') returns to the theatre to direct this visionary new production, 'Frankenstein' by Nick Dear, based on the novel by Mary Shelley. This encore screening of the production originally broadcast on 24th of March stars Jonny Lee Miller as the Creature and Benedict Cumberbatch in the role of Victor.

Film length: 150 mins

Contains one scene of sexual violence

in 2D
